SetLangDesc: Update GUI to newly selected language.
EnableWidgetsDesc: Toggle to enable or disable widgets.
LabelExample: This is a test text from lang folder. This text must have line breaks due to its length. However, BGForce takes care of this for you!
ListExampleDesc: This an example list with translation enabled.
